Institution Name: AHMAN PATEGI UNIVERSITY, PATIGI, KWARA STATE
Direct Entry Requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes chosen from Economics, Accounting, Business Management, Government and Geography.
UTME Requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two (2) other subjects.

For NBC holders, the other two (2) relevant subjects could be from any of Principles of Accounts, Commerce, Office Practice and Secretarial Duties.
Subjects: Mathematics, Economics plus any Social Science subject.
